# SARA Institute

Savitribai Ramabai Institute of Data Science, also called SARA Institute, is a charitable educational organization. We provide free data science, research, and English language education to underrepresented students in India.

We are influenced and inspired by many Dalit, Adivasi, and Bahujan leaders for social democracy and justice. We need your love and support. Please feel free to contact us at:
